title: Which is the most difficult chapter of biology in 11th and 12th combined? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bio-11th :- Animal Diversity (as there are many classes and examples to remember), Human Physiology (in this you will come across many concepts that one need to learn very carefully). Bio-12th:- Genetics (again this is also a conceptual topic, many questions come from this unit), Human health & disease (it also full of memorizing chapter- the names of diseases and their lifecycles in humans). All the Best.

11th - Plant physiology, Human physiology (Nervous system and excretory system), Plant anatomy ( I feel it kinda hard ) 12th - Molecular basis of inheritance ( Disaster ), Biotechnology ( small but hard )
